name: WeSEE
overview:
WeSEE is a hybrid search, content filtering and advertising company. It finds the most relevant possible search results by adding object localization and pattern recognition technologies to mathematical algorithms. WeSEE’s core product is a proprietary engine that harnesses the powers of pattern recognition, semantics, mathematics and artificial neural networking techniques. technology

This enables WeSEE to find any type of content automatically without relying on text descriptions and tags. WeSEE therefore gives ‘structure’ to ‘unstructured data’ so that it can be detected, retrieved and monetised automatically.

WeSEE was formed in London 2010. Senior management include CEO and founder Prof Alexander Yudashkin, who has 15 years of expertise in pattern recognition technology, and web professionals and co-founders Angie Lopez and Adrian Moxley, who were both formerly Senior Directors at Lycos Europe.

Headquartered in London, UK, WeSEE offers three main products â€“ WeSEE:PiFilter, WeSEE:Ads and WeSEE:Search - to publishers, Internet Service Providers and social networks.

milestones.description: WeSEE.com alfa visual search engine for social media is launched. It contains Pinterest and Cinemagram items.
